forum.content:
It's a Chinese tradition. We're having our year-end party tonight for the first time after the firm merge. I guess everyone 's hope toward the grand prizes. Clearly, not the good food... well, so much for the exciting night hearing other colleges' names. We call this an end for the feast. and I still not winning anything this year.

Anyone here wanna share your happy moments at the year-end party?

(this pic is not from our party but some misc upload from Google.)
forum.title: [ Sharing ] Year-end party happy moments
